name: Code Warriors Hackathon
description: Team up and build innovative solutions in 36 hours of intense coding, learning, and collaboration with tech mentors.

name: Dhaka Music Fest
description: Experience a high-energy celebration of local and international music performances across genres and cultures.

name: Creative Writing Workshop
description: Sharpen your storytelling skills and unlock creativity with this interactive writing and publishing workshop.

name: Bangladesh Science Olympiad
description: Compete with the brightest minds in physics, chemistry, and biology in this prestigious student competition.
